alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:25PM EDT until June 17 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Florence County in northeastern South Carolina... Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... Northeastern Darlington County in northeastern South Carolina... Northwestern Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 725 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cheraw State Park, or near Cheraw, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Bennettsville, Marion, Dillon, Darlington, Latta, Quinby, Clio, Sellers, Fork, Blue Brick, Zion, Mont Clare, Mars Bluff, Brownsville, Chavistown, Floyd, Minturn, Dovesville and Oak Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
